name: websocket-demo
description: WebSocket server and React client demo projects

scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.start: npm run build:types && concurrently --kill-others -c "blue,green" -n "server,client" "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client"
scripts.dev: npm run build:types && concurrently --kill-others -c "blue,green" -n "server,client" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
